rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0001
rows.name:
When I look at it now, this capital of
yours is pretty prosperous.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0002
rows.name: Far cry from Gula.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0003
rows.name: ...Is that how you see it, Nia?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0004
rows.name: Well, am I wrong?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0005
rows.name:
Your technology is so much more
advanced than Gula's, and you've
got army facilities, hot springs...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0006
rows.name:
Looks to me like you've got all you
need right here. I guess I don't get why
you had to go and annex Gula...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0007
rows.name:
...Superbia generally has a rather
hot climate, you see.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0008
rows.name:
We developed by actively exploiting
technology which uses the heat, as well
as that we obtained through salvage.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0009
rows.name:
But as the Divine Beast nears the end of its
lifetime, the temperature has started
rising steadily.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0010
rows.name:
Ironically, while this has made our
heat-powered technologies even more
efficient...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0011
rows.name:
Our farmland has done very much
the opposite of flourish.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0012
rows.name: The Divine Beast's lifetime, huh...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0013
rows.name:
Yes, it shouldn't be long now.
The day when Superbia's Divine Beast
becomes uninhabitable.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0014
rows.name:
Sensing that, the Senate started a war
to conquer a new home for our people.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0015
rows.name: ...That'd be Gula, then.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0016
rows.name: ...Indeed.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0017
rows.name: What do I say to that?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0018
rows.name: You realize there was a better way?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0019
rows.name: All this because of dumb pride...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0101
rows.name: ...Was there, now?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0102
rows.name:
Our two governments could've just
talked, got to know each other,
become friends...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0103
rows.name: We could've worked together on this!

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0104
rows.name:
Just like you and me. We were enemies
at first, sure, but now we're allies,
fighting on the same side.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0105
rows.name:
If our nations could've done the same,
it wouldn't have had to come to war.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0106
rows.name: ...Perhaps so.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0107
rows.name:
If everyone in this world thought like
you do, terror and strife wouldn't be
so commonplace.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0108
rows.name:
Well, come on... You're not just gonna
give up, are you?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0109
rows.name: What do you mean?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0110
rows.name:
If there's no need for strife, then
we should just get rid of it.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0111
rows.name:
Rex told us, right?
If we reach the World Tree, there'll
be no need for fighting any more.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0112
rows.name:
You think Eden is the answer to all
our troubles, do you?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0113
rows.name:
I don't care if people laugh, call it
a pipe dream, or whatever...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0114
rows.name:
I'd rather be an optimist than just
despair at the state of the world.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0115
rows.name: Haha... You have a point.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0116
rows.name:
I hope you'll lend us your strength to
reach that goal, Meleph. It'd be grand
if we could count on your support.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0117
rows.name:
I will. They call me the Empire's finest,
and I intend to prove it.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0201
rows.name: What do you mean?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0202
rows.name:
You didn't have to act so high and
mighty. You coulda been humble.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0203
rows.name:
But no. I dunno if you were refusing to
show weakness, or if you just felt you
were better than us...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0204
rows.name:
But you put your damn pride above
all other things and chose to invade.
Am I wrong?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0205
rows.name:
You started a war. Wanting to save
lives, you ended up losing lives.
How backwards is that?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0206
rows.name: If you can't make enough food...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0207
rows.name:
why not just...bow your head and ask
if you could share?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0208
rows.name:
I mean, we were enemies once, but
now we understand each other...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0209
rows.name:
How could a sodding government
not even think of it?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0210
rows.name:
A point well made...
But the world is not as straightforward
a place as that.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0211
rows.name:
Sometimes the most obvious way
is the most difficult to take.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0212
rows.name: Cor... People are such a pain...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0213
rows.name: No question...

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0214
rows.name:
That's exactly why I want to support
the boy, and other upright people
like him.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0215
rows.name: You mean Rex?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0216
rows.name:
A world with no strife...
Can you imagine something so
wonderful, if it were true?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0217
rows.name:
And if there's anyone who could ever
make it true, it's him.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0218
rows.name:
Every age needs its own dreamers
to forge new paths, after all.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0219
rows.name:
Hah... You're full of surprises, Meleph.
You always struck me as straight-laced.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0220
rows.name:
But here you are, believing in the
Eden story.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0221
rows.name:
It's not just little boys and girls that
follow their dreams, is it?

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0223
rows.name:
I too want to see the fruits of this
dream you all share. That's why I'm
with you.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0224
rows.name:
Well, whatever your motive,
it's nice to have you with us, Meleph.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0225
rows.name:
Yeah, I think we can make good use
of the Empire's finest!

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0226
rows.name: Please do.

rows.label: kizunatalk023_msg0227
rows.name:
No matter what path we tread,
I'll be there to help you on the way...
